name: Abyatar Fanuel Lantera
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeayy! Here's for more steps ahead!
text3: And it will never change, no matter what
text4: You are so special to this world, to my world
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
